website_summaries.verdict: A great budget choice for the first several months, this swing runs on a long-life battery, so it's extremely portable. For babies up to 20 pounds. Users rave about its quiet operation.
pros: Five speeds, eight melodies and three nature sounds relax baby, and two plush toys provide entertainment
The mesh sides keep baby cool and easily visible
Great for travel, grandma's house or just an inexpensive alternative
cons: Swing struggles for some as babies approach the 20-pound weight limit

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t swing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the swing, it only can use batteries. The main thing is that after I bought the batteries, installed it, it doesn’t swing. I used Hughes speed, it still doesn’t swing. very disappointed with this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this to have when my great granddaughter come to visit
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to have when my great granddaughter come to visit. I love it and can't say enough about it. She is 3 months and sleep for 20 to 30 minutes. Well, I put her in this and in fifteen minutes she's good for 3 to 4 hours. I saw where some complained that the music wasn't loud enough. But, I feel it's just right for a baby. Also another plus is that it is so easy to fold up and put away until the next visit.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable swing! Super cozy fabric, folds up flat to take anywhere! Battery operated, but great power when swinging. I actually like the music a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first because it was portable and would be able to fold it up and out of the way. How ever at about 3 1/2 months of use.it stops swinging when my baby moves around while in it. So if he kicks his legs it throws it off and it stops swinging. So going to the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off Randomly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The swing is portable, and fits in small places! We were able to travel with this swing. Cons: Overall, I was very disappointed by this swing. It randomly turns off and stops swinging (sometimes after 2 minutes of swinging, sometimes after 10 minutes). Or, if it doesn’t turn off, the music will randomly stop playing. It’s been incredibly frustrating trying to use this swing with a newborn—my newborn wakes up either because the whole swing shuts off or the music stops playing. The toys on the swing face out (not towards the baby). I would not recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting
customer_reviews.text: This swing is a great purchase for all infants. This is our 3rd we have purchased and we would not chose another brand for a swing. Battery operated for easy portability. Folds in half for storage and easy to carry. Easy to view your infant resting from all angles. As advised by all swings, your child should not be left to sleep in this swing. But it's a great help in soothing the baby to sleep to then place in the crib for naptime/bedtime. Highly reccomend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: This swing is made nicely and it’s really sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This swing is made nicely and it’s really sturdy for the price. I wish it had a ac plug attached though. The only thing I didn’t like is... why are the toys that’s hanging on the top facing outwards? I just didn’t get it. Basically the baby will be looking at the toys behind. I couldn’t find out a way to adjust the toys so it’s facing the baby.
customer_reviews.author: er1gurl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing swing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Battery lasts forever! This swing is small, portable, and not an eye sore in your home. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good until they learn how to disrupt the swinging
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swing for my nephew when he was 3-7 months old, easy to store and operate. Because it uses inertia to keep steady swinging it doesn't eat through batteries like you'd expect. However it isn't the greatest once he started to work against the rhythm; especially now that he's gotten bigger. Maybe not all babies will learn this, but he sure did and will throw fits once it stops.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great print, soft fabric, Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Took me 30 minutes total to unbox, unwrap, read instructions, put together and then fold for a corner. And I was paying more attention to TV program, so probably 15 min tops. Very EASY! Batteries not included, so get a box of D's when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift, and when my son assembled it today, he discovered the toy bar and toys were missing! It is all assembled, so I don't want to return it for a replacement. The swing is very nice, and my grandson seems to like it a lot. But without the toy bar and toys, it is not complete. The Customer Service representative would not give me any idea how long it would take to have it replaced when I called to report the missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPER ON AMAZON THAN ANYWHERE ELSE
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together, SO cute and low to the ground (which I prefer) this thing is like $20 more at buybuy baby and anywhere else online.
customer_reviews.author: mama_cass

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The only semi-hard thing about this is that the instructions can get somewhat confusing considering the fact that they are only pictures and no words at all! However the swing works amazing and does the greatest job to make a baby sleep. It has many songs to put a baby to sleep, along with calming noises such as heart beat and rain. 100% recommended, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Great portability but very flimsy. Stopped working after 3 uses. Like others have shared, the device won't swing and the light keeps flashing. Tried resetting, replacing batteries, etc but it will not stay swinging. Music still works. Hope to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Westley Connor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this travel swing to take to work. We have an infant at work program up to 6 months. My daughter seems to like the swing so far. My gripe with it is that the toy bar and being so low to the ground makes it hard to get her out of the swing. I'm happy with it overall for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: ALW

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully and granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: product was faulty. works beautifully and granddaughter loves it, but the left strap was upside down, therefore not allowing us to properly buckle her up. I kept it because it is close to the ground and i didnt want to go through the trouble of unassembling it and waiting for another delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gray

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve ever bought for my babies!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously best $$ spent!!! Love this swing. Better then all the others out there. Very well made and so simple!! You’ll be glad you got it!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: My coworker loved this for her baby shower. It’s definitely heavy to carry in the box by itself. My cousin uses the same swing and her infant absolutely loves the swing with songs!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Berto

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my 4 month old Godson! It was very easy to assemble, I did it myself in less than 20 minutes. It’s cute I love it! Perfect swing to put him asleep
customer_reviews.author: Neika

customer_reviews.title: Not for babies over 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 13 pounds, purchased this for camping and it hardly moves with her in it, even on high speed. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Carter

customer_reviews.title: Broks After 3rd Use
customer_reviews.text: This swing was easy to assemble and I like the look of it; however, when I went to use it for the 3rd time a button broke on it. I put my baby in the swing and began to swing him. I pushed the button to play music, at a normal force, and the whole button caved in. Now I have a swing with a music function that no longer plays music. I was very disappointed that this happened, especially so easily and soon after purchase. It’s a cute looking swing but go with a different brand for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing! Perfect height, very cute! Has options for time, sounds, how fast to swing, & volume. I'm only giving it 4 stars due to the volume. It is very low. Other than that, I highly recommend this product! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cannon

customer_reviews.title: It make Traveling easy
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson love it it put him to sleep fast and it’s a easy Traveling swing
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Best portable swing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I would be able to take it from room to room or to a friends house if I go visit. It was easy to assemble. Only took about 15 minutes. Just wish it has a vibration mode and it didn’t turn off automatically after a certain time. I do like how I can easily fold it up and carry with one hand and how the mobile thing goes back. Makes it easy to get her in and out.
customer_reviews.author: TelaFaye

customer_reviews.title: would not use after 6months.
customer_reviews.text: this says 20lb but i would say after 5months if your child is over 14lb dont use it. mines sqeeks and shakes about like its about to fall apart and my baby is 6months and 15lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swings sort of fast
customer_reviews.text: It was dirty when arrived, the straps didn't adjust.one speed of fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Swing does not work at low speed settings
customer_reviews.text: The main reason for buying this product was its swing and it does not work at low speeds. It works only at 4 and 5 speed settings which is kind of high for infants. The other drawback for me is, it relies only on batteries. There also seems to be some lose contact as the device randomly seems to be turning off. I am using Energizer D Cell Batteries .
customer_reviews.author: DilipVarma

customer_reviews.title: Not that happy
customer_reviews.text: This swing was a big disappointment. We purchased this swing for our grandson and it has never worked correctly. The swing hits the base of the frame every time unless we constantly adjust the frame or put a flat weight on the bottom. The swing itself is just okay, our kids loved their swing but these new ones just aren’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L

customer_reviews.title: horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I dislike it a lot it had no cord its batteries only,its really loose and i barley put it together,i like the style and color but has a lot of negatives,the volume is also very low
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Swing was cute but the swing motion was little to none even on the highest setting with a 11lb baby In it, I’ve seen the mixed reviews before buying hoping I wouldn’t get a defective swing . Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've only used a few time and button broke. It stops swinging baby within a 10 min without timer. Not with the $100 I paid. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: gabriel solis

customer_reviews.title: Great little swing
customer_reviews.text: Great little swing. My baby likes it. It’s not that easy to travel though but still recommend it. The chair part folds in half but the legs and everything else does not fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is portable and small so it doesn’t take up much space in my living room. It is neutral enough to use for my daughter. She was a little to small in it when she was first born but she is now two months and fits in it good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: Great product grandson loves but will only be able to use for a couple months because of weight. Did realise only goes up to a 20 lbs baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not portable
customer_reviews.text: It says portable but to me anything that can be portable should be compact. This is not. Super bulky and tedious to take down.
customer_reviews.author: ShaRhonda

customer_reviews.title: This item is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This item is garbage. It’s wobbly no matter what i do, it won’t stay sturdy and the magnet isn’t strong enough to stay on and rock my 13lb baby. I regret purchasing this item and will never recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Esaavee

customer_reviews.title: Quiet And Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. I bought this for my newest grandson because the one they had was loud and it was bothersome when his parents were trying to get a few hours of much needed sleep. Unlike the other one they have, it's size is perfect for hauling from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: tothemoonz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great buy. We use this swing on a daily and my newborn son absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Big letdown purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy w this purchase. Wish we could return. Doesn't work well. Glitchy and assembly is rocky at best. I love ingenuity but this is one of their worst products I've tried. Sits in corner now. Used maybe 4x
customer_reviews.author: jen semper

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works ok, not aggressive on swing motion. Head rest is a little high for smaller babies
customer_reviews.author: williamdg67

customer_reviews.title: Great for an infant not newborn
customer_reviews.text: I like this product over 6 months. Before that it seems to bully and a bouncy chair is much more convenient. This is bulky to move from room to room. Saving it for him when he gets a little older. He is only 6 weeks right now.
customer_reviews.author: kim gudgeon

customer_reviews.title: The lock pin fall inside the tub
customer_reviews.text: I started ensambling and the lock pin went inside and is impossible to bring it out
customer_reviews.author: MMT

customer_reviews.title: Trying to soothe a fussy baby
customer_reviews.text: By far the quietest swing we tried. Lightweight and easy to pack. Music and nature sounds very soothing as is the smooth rocking motion. Well made and sturdy. The only mild negative is the Instructions. Written part not as helpful as the pictures but assembly still pretty easy. Our grandson is collicky at night and fussy in the day. We hope the swing encourages more frequent and longer naps! Will follow up in a month to see if it helps even a little.
customer_reviews.author: Sigmon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well. Super hard to get on the right setting. Ended up just giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Gee

customer_reviews.title: Not impresses
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together however bc it is so low is only slightly swings. My baby is 3 months old and is almost too big for it. She may have used it 5 to 10 times for about 5 min each. There just wasnt enough swing to really entertain her.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Soileau

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This swing was purchased for my 2 month old and she weighs ten pounds it doesnt work for her
customer_reviews.author: Harmony holl

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing, great niece loved it.. It was a life saver! would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KRLARAMO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my cousin as a gift and she absolutely loves it. She said it's perfect and there is nothing she would change about it. No complaints whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pancorbo

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandbaby. The kids take it when visiting everywhere, its easy to transport in thier hatchback, easy to set up. Best thing I could have gifted them
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brower

customer_reviews.title: It is a great swing but is missing 2 pieces so unfortunately I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great swing but is missing 2 pieces so unfortunately I have not been able to use it. I called Ingenuity and they stated they don't have the parts.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vanlandingham

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Soothes my baby! It’s amazing. Great quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mamanda

customer_reviews.title: It does not swing
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective and does not work. Bought batteries and insert them, it sswing for about 10 seconds and stopped. The music is so low the poor child is unable to hear it. The only reason I am not returning is because I am in Jamaica and it will cost me an arm and leg to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Ms Chinn

customer_reviews.title: I like it but it was covered in dog hair
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute swing. Was supposed to be new in a damaged box. When I received it opened and took it out of box and it was covered in dog hair!!! Was not happy about that!!
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Portable- easy to move  around
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It's portable enough to move around the house. Multiple speed settings.
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Received broken but ..
customer_reviews.text: Received this broken, looks like whoever put this together just jammed a part in there the wrong way and cracked the whole bottom. Other than that looks like a great product and simple to put together, just waiting on my replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift and they seemed to like it!
customer_reviews.author: Leighann

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life. Bad value.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because of the design, but returned because the battery life is so short. I can't believe it cost so much then you have to buy so many batteries to make it work. I decided to go with a swing that operates on a plug.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Zayzay

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for occasional use. Takes battery wish it plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Cherryleedrinkard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take with you and super cute. Love that it has volume settings and timers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the look but baby position is sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice looking, soft, but it makes the babies neck squish more then other swings and it freaks me out.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My kid liked it. It is comfortable, it is light but sturdy; it can be move around easy.
customer_reviews.author: Julio J.

customer_reviews.title: Animal bar built backwards
customer_reviews.text: The bar holding the animals is actually built backwards so your little one can’t see their faces. Otherwise cute swing!

customer_reviews.title: Great portable swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I can fold it up and put it away when I'm not using it with my grandson.

customer_reviews.title: Ingenuity Swing n Go Portable Baby Swing
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I did not receive anything negative about the gift that I purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Baby finds it soothing
customer_reviews.text: The price was less than other swings that I had priced

customer_reviews.title: This is the swing to get
customer_reviews.text: My baby was 10lbs before she loved this! We bought 3 swings in total... the other two were more expensive, less mobile, but this was the only one she liked!

customer_reviews.title: It was just the right fit 4 my grandchild
customer_reviews.text: I like the swing because my grandchild enjoyed the nursery ry and the swing itself it is good 2 keep her busy while I can get others done that I need to get done

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my sister for my nephew...she loves it!! Great product

customer_reviews.text: Love it because it allows me to get things done

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, you can find a better swing and even cheaper with better quality at Walmart! Not worth it, it’s not sturdy, super wobbly and unsafe!

customer_reviews.title: So quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swing for my grandson. We LOVE it. It is so quiet. It’s very portable and doesn’t take up too much space. I highly recommend this swing!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 swings for my twins I absolutely love it and very easy to put together

customer_reviews.title: Good product great value.
customer_reviews.text: The swing is nice and solid. Its comfortable enough to soothe my daughter when she is upset sometimes. The music options also help with sleeping in my use.

customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, fairly easy to assemble when you follow the instructions! :) Music option is soothing. Nice design

customer_reviews.text: So far I absolutely love this swing. It soothed our baby to sleep within minutes. Lots of smiles! I would absolutely recommend.

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Boutique Collection Swing 'n Go Portable Swing - Bella Teddy
product_meta.description: Style:Bella TeddyDesigned with parenthood in mind. Ingenuity designed the Boutique Series Swing 'n Go Portable Swing with premium, luxurious fabrics that are as comfy-cozy as they are practical. Remarkably soft fabrics pamper baby in luxurious softness with an added bolster and character head rest that offer extra support for smaller babies and can be removed as baby grows. Even the safety harness is wrapped in soft, fleecy fabrics to protect baby's sensitive skin. The tasteful Boutique fashion is sure to compliment the decor of any home. Perfect for a girl or boy. When things get a little messy, the contoured headrest and seat pad can be removed and tossed in the washing machine. The modern design and technology upgrades baby's soothing experience to the next level. This fully-loaded, compact swing soothes baby with 5 swing speeds, 8 melodies and 3 nature sounds. A pivoting toy bar offers 2 adorable plush toys for engaging baby. You'll save money on batteries thanks to Hybrid rive Technology. Your batteries last up to 3 times longer. True Speed weight sensing technology keeps baby's favorite swing speeds consistent, even as baby gets bigger. Our Slim Fold design allows the swing to fold flat for easy storage and transport. Get a few hands-free moments with a swing timer that can be set to 30, 45 and 60 minutes. Whisper Quiet technology allows baby to swing in near silence. Safety-enhanced with 5-point harness and non-slip feet for security.
feature_bullets: Deluxe plush fabrics with removable headrest
5 swing speeds, 8 melodies and 3 nature sounds. Weight Maximum (lb) 20.0, Weight Minimum (lb) 6.0
True Speed technology means baby's favorite speed will remain consistent, even as baby gets bigger
Whisper Quiet operation for a virtually noiseless experience
Powered by Hybrid rive Technology for on the go travel-batteries last up to 3 times longer
Care: Frame, toy bar, and toys - Wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap.

specifications.Care instructions: Seat pad and headrest - Machine wash with cold water, gentle cycle.Frame, toy bar, and toys - Wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild soap.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,904 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
